page.title: 01Description of our area
page.content: We are a four by three kilometre patch.There is one primary school in our area, with four houses nearby.There is one garage serving our area and there are no shops except for a mini-market at the filling station in Trevennen.There are some mobile deliveries which travel round the district.There are two council estates one at Gweek and one at Trewennack. Most of our area is farmland.It is a mixture of permanent pasture and arable land.Most of the farms are dairy farms.The surrounding countryside has a few scattered houses.There are several steep hills leading away from Boskenwyn Downs.There are tree lined lanes and several wooded sections.
